overview: It’s all about the pretty young thing Lyle Boyce! As we’re granted unrivaled access into this fresh-faced star of the porn screen, what seems like a shy and retiring weekend is soon turned around into a sex-fueled adventure with no less than 4 sexual escapades that will leave your head spinning and balls empty! From muscled stud pick-ups to a damn hot neighbor inviting him round for something sweeter than dessert, Lyle has all the luck, and most probably a very tired ass come Monday morning! Join him on this inside take on the weekend of a pornstar.
title: A Weekend With Lyle
